product_name: Burton Lexa EST Snowboard Bindings - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: If you're looking to dominate the entire mountain, and want a binding that is fully adjustable and well cushioned for all-day comfort, choose the women's Burton Lexa EST(TM) snowboard bindings. The EST platform offers endless stance options and a truer flex from your board; plus, with personalized cushioning options, you'll enjoy ultimate feel and control. Women-specific True Fit design means that every element of the product is designed and engineered for the way women ride. 30% short-glass/nylon composite EST baseplate material is responsive yet still plenty playful. Canted Living Hinge(TM) highbacks eliminate hardware to reduce weight, and let you adjust forward lean and highback rotation independently of each other. Removable AutoCANT SensoryBED(TM) dual-density EVA cushioning lets your boots settle into a natural position; B3 gel cushioning eats up vibration and impact. All-new Reactstraps(TM) feature a curved, 3D profile and ultra-responsive padding for constant contact with your boots; lightweight Gettagrip capstrap toe straps. Smooth Glide(TM) buckles deliver buttery-smooth and reliable ratcheting power season after season. 2014 Lexa EST bindings will fit 2011 through 2014 Channel Boards with the included black hardware.
